name: Vinsmoke Sora
text: On Play: If your Leader is [Sanji] and the number of DON!! cards on your field is equal to or less than the number of DON!! cards on your opponent's field, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it. Then, draw 1 card.

effect.text: If your Leader is [Sanji] and the number of DON!! cards on your field is equal to or less than the number of DON!! cards on your opponent's field, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it. Then, draw 1 card.
